entities.name: Game Lobby
entities.description: This is the Lobby. Enter 'create' to start a vtPaintball game, or 'join to join an existing game. A Sign is hanging off one of the wall - you can 'look sign' to read it.

entities.name: A Sign
entities.description: The sign reads: 'Welcome to vtPaintball! This is a multiplayer, text-based game. Once you enter 'create' or 'join <some ID>', you will be teleported to the game area, which is a made of many connected rooms. You will be assigned to a Red or Blue team: enter 'shot <player name> to eliminate an opponent. First team to reach the required score - Wins!'
